thread.title: DFI Technologies Announces it Will Exhibit at G2E, the Gaming and Entertainment Industry's Pre-eminent International Conference
thread.title_full: DFI Technologies Announces it Will Exhibit at G2E, the Gaming and Entertainment Industry's Pre-eminent International Conference

title: DFI Technologies Announces it Will Exhibit at G2E, the Gaming and Entertainment Industry's Pre-eminent International Conference
text: DFI Technologies Announces it Will Exhibit at G2E, the Gaming and Entertainment Industry's Pre-eminent International Conference Embedded computer systems manufacturer showcasing its industry-leading gaming and hospitality products "We see G2E as THE place to showcase our innovative products.This event is a who's who of decision makers for technology direction and investment for the gaming and entertainment industries." SACRAMENTO, CA, September 24,   DFI Technologies announced today that it will be exhibiting at G2E, the leading international gaming trade how and conference. DFI will be exhibiting several of its industry leading products for the gaming market. "We see G2E as THE place to showcase our innovative products for gaming and hospitality" said Mr. David Lu, CEO of DFI Technologies. "This event is a who's who of decision makers for technology direction and investment for the gaming and entertainment community." DFI Technologies will be showcasing several of its products at G2E this year, including: SD630 - This clear acrylic system was built to showcase DFI's latest embedded motherboards based on Intel's 6th Generation processors. It has our most powerful onboard graphics to date and we're using it to demonstrate some amazing visuals on a 4K display. EC700 - A fanless system that is DFI's smallest footprint. It's designed to be rugged and handle the type of vibration that you would experience in a vehicle. It's also quite capable and features Intel's 4th Generation Atom processor which provides great performance while consuming very little power. MK20/515 - This is the latest version of DFI's 20 inch interactive kiosk. We've increased the size of the display to 21", upgraded its quality with an IPS panel and enhanced its clarity with a projected capacitive touchscreen that no longer reveals the touch sensors. All while maintaining the system's most important feature, the seamless one-piece face. KS310 - This is a fanless, panel-mount system with a 10 inch display and a Freescale i.MX6 processor. This system demonstrates what DFI can do with ARM processors in an embedded application. EC541 - This is the winner of Computex 2014's Design and Innovation award. It is an industrial system that showcases our new modular design philosophy with internal components and a chassis design that can be configured between 1 to 5 expansion slots. Additionally the chassis can configured to an actively cooled or fanless system depending on the needs of the environment. M100/520 - This is the latest version of our flagship 1U graphic engine that features Intel's 4th Generation processors. It combines high performance computing, with high-end, discrete graphics in a low-profile, 1U chassis that's rack mountable. ART101 - This 10.1" Android-based, rugged tablet is a new category of product for us. It's designed for heavy use and integrates an array of sensors to scan, identify and track materials and assets used in warehouses and manufacturing. Visitors to our booth this year will be able to see the unit in action as we use it to scan badges. To see these industry leading solutions at G2E, please visit us at Booth 3413. You can also learn more about DFI Technologies and all our products and services at www.dfitech.com About DFI Technologies DFI Technologies provides high quality, long life, custom computing solutions to meet the embedded computer and motherboard needs of a variety of industries, including Gaming, Medical Device & Healthcare, Digital Signage, Interactive Kiosks, Transportation, Industrial Automation, Communications, and Security. Located in Sacramento since 1985, and winner of multiple awards for its rapid and sustained growth, DFI Technologies excels in designing, integrating, and servicing small form factor, fanless, all-in-one, and multi-function industrial-grade PCs with the longest product lifecycle in the industry. For more information, please visit www.dfitech.com . Marketing and PR by AchieveDMA. # # #
